publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market.
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Alex Neil*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Hugh Henry*, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Colin Campbell*

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1827 Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban (lodged on 4 April 2001) Ian Jenkins*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Ian Jenkins, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Ian Jenkins, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Ian Jenkins, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Ian Jenkins, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani

S1M-1827 Dr Winnie Ewing: Animal-tested Cosmetics Ban—That the Parliament congratulates the European Parliament on its backing for new measures across the EU to have all new cosmetic products which have been tested on animals taken off the market. Supported by: Alex Neil, Dr Elaine Murray, Hugh Henry, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dennis Canavan, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Roseanna Cunningham, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Ian Jenkins, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani, Christine Grahame
